alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 5:20PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Gadsden and central Leon Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 520 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Havana, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Florida State University, Macon Community Park, Levy Park, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Orchard Pond, Maclay State Gardens, Gibson, Killearn Lakes, Tallahassee Coml Airport, Killearn Estates, Fallschase, Lake Ella, Lake Jackson, Tallahassee Mall, Bradfordville, Winthrop Park, Kleman Plaza, Tom Brown Park and State Capital Complex. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
